revision.text:
<!--책_정보-->
{{TemplateMapping
| mapToClass = Book
| mappings =
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 이름 | ontologyProperty = foaf:name }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 원제 | ontologyProperty = foaf:name }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 영문 표기 | ontologyProperty = foaf:name }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 번역가 | ontologyProperty = translator }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 저자 | ontologyProperty = author }}
 	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 삽화가 | ontologyProperty = illustrator }}
	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 표지 화가 | ontologyProperty = coverArtist }}
 	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 국가 | ontologyProperty = country }}
 	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 언어 | ontologyProperty = language }}
 	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 시리즈 | ontologyProperty = series }}
 	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 주제 | ontologyProperty = nonFictionSubject }}
 	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 장르 | ontologyProperty = literaryGenre }}
 	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 출판사 | ontologyProperty = publisher }}
 	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 발행일 | ontologyProperty = publicationDate }}
 	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 한국어 발행일 | ontologyProperty = publicationDate }}
 	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 미디어 종류 | ontologyProperty = mediaType }}
 	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 페이지 | ontologyProperty = numberOfPages }}
 	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = ISBN | ontologyProperty = isbn }}
 	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = OCLC | ontologyProperty = oclc }}
 	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 이전 작품 | ontologyProperty = previousWork }}
 	{{PropertyMapping | templateProperty = 다음 작품 | ontologyProperty = subsequentWork }}

end}}
